body.raw:
{
"client_name": "11TestName1221",
"redirect_uris": ["{{redirectUrl}}"],
"jwks_uri": "https://www.jsonkeeper.com/b/3FJT",
"scope": "client.create client.read fdx:transactions:read fdx:accountbasic:read openid fdx:customerpersonal:read fdx:accountdetailed:read fdx:investments:read fdx:paymentsupport:read fdx:accountpayments:read fdx:bills:read fdx:images:read fdx:rewards:read fdx:tax:read fdx:statements:read fdx:customercontact:read",
"token_endpoint_auth_method": "private_key_jwt",
"token_endpoint_auth_signing_alg": "PS256",
"grant_types": [
    "client_credentials",
    "authorization_code",
    "refresh_token"
],
"response_types": [
    "code"
],
"id_token_signed_response_alg": "PS256",
"id_token_encrypted_response_alg": "RSA-OAEP",
"id_token_encrypted_response_enc": "A256GCM",
"request_object_signing_alg": "PS256"
}

exec: 'exp': currentTimestamp + 3000, // expiry time is 30 seconds from time of creation
//'sub': "user1"  // PAR enforces ISS != SUB, plus we may not know the sub, so leave out.
'exp': currentTimestamp + dataholderAccessDuration, // expiry time is 300 (5 min) from time of creation

"scope": "fdx:transactions:read fdx:accountbasic:read openid fdx:customerpersonal:read fdx:accountdetailed:read fdx:investments:read fdx:paymentsupport:read fdx:accountpayments:read fdx:bills:read fdx:images:read fdx:rewards:read fdx:tax:read fdx:statements:read fdx:customercontact:read",
'exp': currentTimestamp + 3000, // expiry time is 30 seconds from time of creation
